entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

More info: Writing

Run server

More info: Server

Generate static files

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

More info: Deployment

entry.title: My Introuction
entry.content:
My Introuction

Hello, everyone. My name is Chen Junhong. I want to introduce myself to you.
I like playing table tennis and traveling. I also like writing calligraphy and photography occasionally. My favorite song is Taylorâ€™s Love Story, which I put in the background music in the lower left corner.
In addition to these hobbies, I am also proficient in the following skills:

  • C >> I am proficient in a course of freshman study
  • Matlab >> The need for mathematical modeling
  • Linux >> Need to do experiments

Finally, I want to share my future vision with you. I hope that in the future, I can be admitted to the civil service or graduate school of Xiamen University, and I can have a happy, healthy and progressive life.
Write at the end: You can be crazy about Kanban Niang at the bottom right of the page and she will interact with you; All the links in this website are real links, you can click to have a look.
